title: Virtual World-Based Science Education Design: Application of Research-Centered Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A program for working professionals to design science education content and conduct project-based assessments in virtual world environments

learning_goals: Being able to explain a systematic approach for designing virtual world-based science education using the i-MMOLE framework
Being able to implement science experiment scenarios in a virtual world environment through a three-stage process (design-development-execution)
Being able to complete and evaluate team-based science projects in large-scale online environments using collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
